attributes.action: crossing and double yellow lines on goodison boulivard
attributes.additional_details:
We want a crossing for children and double yellow lines outside the co-op shop.
There has been several serious acccidents and something needs to be done...

rejection.details: This is a matter for the relevant local authority (since the petition doesn't say which town or city Goodison Boulevard is in, we can't advise you which authority that would be).
